analysis.description:
MagnaChain.unlock (/unique_chucks/10/0xa6eb54102f20095679882db4c84e72e65ab782a4.sol#268-286) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- MagnaChain.lockedBalance
	- BasicToken.balances
	- MagnaChain.timeRelease
